_meta.title: Oracle Lumira - Prompts Vidéo IA pour Creatives Marketing
_meta.author: Oracle Lumira Creative Team
_meta.usage: Copier le prompt complet (full_prompt) ou assembler les sections modulaires

explanation.SUBJECT: Sujet principal (femme, mains, cartes, mandala...)
explanation.ACTION: Ce que fait le sujet (médite, révèle, contemple...)
explanation.CAMERA: Mouvement caméra (slow dolly, orbit, crane up...)

master_template.description: Template maître à personnaliser pour chaque scène
master_template.template: Cinematic {style} shot of {subject} {action} in {environment}. {lighting_description}. Camera: {camera_movement}. Atmosphere: {atmosphere_effects}. Style: {artistic_style}. {technical_specs}

variables.subject: Le sujet principal de la scène
variables.camera_movement: Mouvement de caméra lent et fluide

scene_01_hero_awakening.title: L'Éveil Spirituel - Hero Video
scene_01_hero_awakening.purpose: Landing page hero, Instagram Reel, TikTok
scene_01_hero_awakening.full_prompt: Cinematic ethereal shot of a serene woman with closed eyes slowly opening them to reveal a cosmic universe reflected in her irises. She sits in a translucent glass sanctuary floating among nebulae and distant galaxies. Soft volumetric violet and deep blue light rays cascade through crystalline walls, creating prismatic reflections. Golden sacred geometry patterns materialize and orbit gently around her silhouette. Camera: Ultra slow dolly in from medium to close-up on face, 0.5x speed. Atmosphere: Delicate stardust particles drift upward, aurora borealis ribbons dance in background, subtle lens flares. Style: Ethereal fantasy meets astronomical photography, inspired by James Turrell light installations and NASA deep space imagery. 4K, 24fps cinematic, anamorphic lens flare, shallow depth of field, color grade: deep cosmic blues transitioning to mystical violets with divine gold highlights.

modular_components.subject: serene woman with closed eyes
modular_components.action: slowly opening eyes to reveal cosmic universe in irises
modular_components.environment: translucent glass sanctuary floating among nebulae and galaxies
modular_components.lighting: soft volumetric violet and deep blue light rays through crystalline walls
modular_components.camera: ultra slow dolly in from medium to close-up, 0.5x speed
modular_components.atmosphere: stardust particles drifting upward, aurora ribbons, subtle lens flares
modular_components.fx: golden sacred geometry patterns orbiting silhouette
modular_components.technical: 4K, 24fps, anamorphic, shallow DOF, cosmic blue to violet grade

variations: Replace woman with: mystical hands holding glowing tarot card
Replace sanctuary with: ancient temple floating in starfield
Add: third eye chakra glowing with indigo light

scene_02_tarot_revelation.title: Révélation des Cartes - Product Showcase
scene_02_tarot_revelation.full_prompt: Cinematic mystical overhead shot of elegant feminine hands with subtle golden rings slowly turning over a luminescent tarot card on a surface of dark liquid obsidian that reflects infinite stars. As the card reveals, ethereal light emanates upward in spiraling sacred geometry patterns. The card artwork comes alive with gentle particle animations - tiny golden stars escaping the illustrated scene. Deep indigo and violet ambient lighting with concentrated warm golden light illuminating the card and hands. Camera: Smooth overhead crane descending into 45-degree angle, slow motion capture. Atmosphere: Wisps of lavender incense smoke curling through light beams, floating rose petals dissolving into stardust. Style: Luxury editorial meets mystical realism, inspired by Wong Kar-wai cinematography and Renaissance chiaroscuro. 4K HDR, 60fps slowed to 24fps for ultra-smooth motion, rich color depth, film grain texture.

modular_components.subject: elegant feminine hands with golden rings
modular_components.action: slowly turning over luminescent tarot card
modular_components.environment: dark liquid obsidian surface reflecting infinite stars
modular_components.lighting: deep indigo ambient with concentrated golden light on card
modular_components.camera: overhead crane descending to 45-degree, slow motion
modular_components.atmosphere: lavender incense wisps, floating rose petals to stardust
modular_components.fx: sacred geometry light spirals, card artwork particles animating
modular_components.technical: 4K HDR, 60fps to 24fps, film grain, rich color depth

variations: Replace tarot with: glowing crystal sphere with swirling galaxies inside
Add: multiple cards fanning out in golden ratio spiral
Change surface to: ancient marble altar with carved constellations

scene_03_sanctuary_portal.title: Portail du Sanctuaire - App Experience
scene_03_sanctuary_portal.purpose: App store preview, Feature showcase, Transition
scene_03_sanctuary_portal.full_prompt: Cinematic dreamlike first-person perspective smoothly gliding through an ornate celestial gateway into a vast personal sanctuary space. The portal frame is adorned with flowing golden sacred geometry that pulses with soft light. Beyond the threshold reveals a serene cosmic meditation chamber with floating translucent platforms, gentle waterfalls of light, and a central mandala that rotates with hypnotic precision. Walls dissolve into deep space vistas of purple and blue nebulae. Bioluminescent flora lines the ethereal pathways. Camera: Steadicam forward glide through portal with subtle upward tilt upon entry, revealing the space. Atmosphere: Particles of light like fireflies guide the path, resonant harmonic vibrations visualized as gentle ripples in the air. Style: Avatar meets Blade Runner 2049 aesthetic, organic technology fusion. 4K, 30fps buttery smooth, wide dynamic range, lens breathing effect.

modular_components.subject: ornate celestial gateway
modular_components.environment: cosmic meditation chamber with floating platforms and central mandala
modular_components.lighting: bioluminescent flora, pulsing golden sacred geometry frame
modular_components.camera: steadicam forward glide with upward tilt reveal
modular_components.atmosphere: light particle fireflies, harmonic ripples in air
modular_components.fx: portal frame pulsing, mandala rotating, waterfalls of light
modular_components.technical: 4K, 30fps smooth, wide dynamic range, lens breathing

variations: Replace gateway with: ancient tree of life with glowing roots
Add: personal constellation map forming overhead upon entry
Include: ethereal guide figure made of starlight beckoning forward

scene_04_mandala_creation.title: Création du Mandala Personnel - Premium Feature
scene_04_mandala_creation.purpose: Premium tier showcase, YouTube ad, Landing section
scene_04_mandala_creation.full_prompt: Cinematic transcendent top-down shot of an intricate personal mandala being created in real-time by invisible cosmic forces. Starting from a single point of brilliant white light at center, sacred geometric patterns bloom outward like a time-lapse flower, each layer adding violet, indigo, and gold luminescent lines. The mandala floats above a mirror-like cosmic pool that reflects an inverted universe. As the pattern completes, it rises and transforms into a three-dimensional sphere of interlocking light geometries. Zodiac symbols and birth chart elements subtly integrate into the design, personalizing the creation. Camera: Static overhead transitioning to slow 360-degree orbit as mandala rises, ending with dramatic low-angle looking up at completed sphere. Atmosphere: Constellation points connect with thin light threads, musical frequencies visualized as color waves emanating from mandala. Style: Sacred geometry art meets generative digital art, inspired by Android Jones and cosmic Buddhist thangka paintings. 4K 60fps, HDR peak brightness for light elements, deep blacks for contrast.

modular_components.subject: personal mandala
modular_components.action: being created by cosmic forces, blooming from center point
modular_components.environment: floating above mirror-like cosmic pool reflecting inverted universe
modular_components.lighting: brilliant white center, violet-indigo-gold luminescent patterns
modular_components.camera: static overhead to 360 orbit to low-angle as mandala rises
modular_components.atmosphere: constellation threads connecting, musical frequencies as color waves
modular_components.fx: real-time sacred geometry bloom, zodiac integration, 3D sphere transformation
modular_components.technical: 4K 60fps, HDR peak brightness, deep blacks contrast

variations: Add: user's birth date numerology appearing as golden numbers
Include: the four elements (fire, water, earth, air) as corner anchors
Finish with: mandala gently descending into viewer's open palms

scene_05_reading_delivery.title: Réception de la Lecture - Emotional Payoff
scene_05_reading_delivery.full_prompt: Cinematic intimate close-up of a person's face illuminated by the soft glow of a tablet/phone screen in a cozy evening setting. Their expression transitions from curiosity to profound recognition and gentle emotional tears of understanding. The screen's light casts an ethereal violet-blue glow on their features. We see reflected in their eyes: flowing text, a personal mandala rotating, glimpses of their unique reading. Soft bokeh of warm candles and fairy lights in background suggest a personal sacred space. A single tear catches the light like a diamond. Camera: Extreme slow motion capture of emotional micro-expressions, subtle push-in ending on reflection in eye. Atmosphere: Dust motes floating in screen light, barely visible aurora glow from device, sense of profound private moment. Style: Intimate documentary realism meets magical realism, inspired by Terrence Malick and Emmanuel Lubezki natural light cinematography. 4K, 120fps slowed dramatically, natural skin tones preserved, minimal color grading.

modular_components.subject: person's face illuminated by device screen
modular_components.action: expression transitioning from curiosity to recognition to gentle tears
modular_components.environment: cozy evening setting with candles and fairy lights
modular_components.lighting: ethereal violet-blue device glow, warm bokeh background
modular_components.camera: extreme slow motion micro-expressions, subtle push-in to eye reflection
modular_components.atmosphere: dust motes in light, private sacred moment feeling
modular_components.fx: mandala and text reflection in eyes, single tear catching light
modular_components.technical: 4K 120fps slow motion, natural skin tones, minimal grading

variations: Replace device with: beautifully designed physical PDF booklet
Add: headphones visible, suggesting audio reading experience
Include: hands gently touching heart in gratitude gesture

scene_06_cosmic_journey.title: Voyage Cosmique - Brand Anthem
scene_06_cosmic_journey.purpose: Brand video, YouTube pre-roll, TV/CTV ad
scene_06_cosmic_journey.full_prompt: Cinematic epic seamless journey beginning with extreme close-up of a human eye, diving into the pupil which transforms into a portal to the cosmos. We travel through spectacular nebulae of violet and indigo, past golden spiral galaxies, through fields of crystalline asteroids that chime like bells. We approach a luminous sanctuary floating in space - an impossible architecture of light, glass, and sacred geometry. Inside, we glimpse souls represented as gentle orbs of unique-colored light, each receiving their cosmic truth. We exit through another eye, pulling back to reveal a diverse mosaic of human faces, each illuminated by their personal light, connected by thin golden threads of shared human experience. Final pull back reveals these faces form the shape of the Oracle Lumira mandala logo. Camera: Continuous single-take feel, seamless transitions between macro, cosmic travel, architecture, and portrait scales. Atmosphere: Each environment has distinct particle systems - neural sparks in eye, cosmic dust in space, light motes in sanctuary, warm human auras in faces. Style: Interstellar meets Tree of Life meets Apple commercial polish. 8K mastered to 4K, variable frame rates for impact, IMAX-inspired aspect ratio shifts.

modular_components.subject: eye portal to cosmos to sanctuary to human mosaic
modular_components.action: continuous travel through scales and environments
modular_components.environment: eye interior, nebulae, crystal asteroids, light sanctuary, human faces
modular_components.lighting: transitions from intimate to cosmic to warm human
modular_components.camera: single-take feel, seamless scale transitions, macro to cosmic to portrait
modular_components.atmosphere: neural sparks, cosmic dust, light motes, human auras
modular_components.fx: eye-portal morph, soul orbs, golden thread connections, logo formation
modular_components.technical: 8K to 4K, variable frame rates, IMAX aspect shifts

variations: Start with: drop of water falling, ripple becoming galaxy spiral
Add: brief glimpses of the four reading levels as ascending platforms
Include: voiceover sync points for key visual moments

scene_07_testimonial_glow.title: Aura Témoignage - Social Proof
scene_07_testimonial_glow.purpose: Testimonial video background, Story frame, UGC template
scene_07_testimonial_glow.full_prompt: Cinematic serene loop of a softly glowing human silhouette seated in meditation pose, surrounded by their personal aura that shifts through Oracle Lumira brand colors - deep cosmic blue, mystical violet, celestial indigo, with occasional pulses of divine gold at the heart center. The figure is slightly abstracted, universal, allowing any viewer to project themselves. Behind them, a slow-rotating personal mandala casts geometric light shadows. Gentle sacred geometry particles orbit the figure like protective spirits. The overall feeling is of someone who has found their truth and radiates peace. Camera: Perfectly static or imperceptible slow zoom out, designed for seamless looping. Atmosphere: Minimal, focused on the glowing figure, subtle breathing rhythm to the light pulses. Style: Meditation app aesthetic elevated to cinematic quality, inspired by Calm and Headspace visuals but more mystical. 4K, 30fps perfect loop, seamless start-end blend, vertical 9:16 and horizontal 16:9 versions.

modular_components.subject: glowing human silhouette in meditation
modular_components.action: radiating shifting aura, breathing light rhythm
modular_components.environment: void with personal mandala casting shadows
modular_components.lighting: self-illuminated figure, brand color aura shifts
modular_components.camera: static or imperceptible zoom, perfect loop
modular_components.fx: aura color transitions, heart gold pulses, mandala shadow rotation

variations: Add: text overlay area designed into composition
Include: second silhouette appearing, representing guide/expert
Modify: standing pose with arms slightly raised in receiving gesture

scene_08_quick_hook.title: Accroche Rapide - Performance Ad
scene_08_quick_hook.purpose: TikTok/Reels hook, Bumper ad, Attention grabber
scene_08_quick_hook.full_prompt: Cinematic punchy extreme close-up of a mystical eye with galaxy-filled iris suddenly opening with dramatic pupil dilation. In the reflection of the eye, we see a tarot card flipping to reveal the viewer's fate. A burst of golden sacred geometry emanates outward from the eye like a shockwave of awakening. Quick flash to black with the Oracle Lumira logo materializing from stardust. The entire sequence has a slight pulse/breath rhythm. Camera: Snap zoom into eye, held, then explosive push through the reflection into logo space. Atmosphere: High contrast, dramatic, condensed version of brand magic. Style: Movie trailer impact meets luxury beauty ad, designed for thumb-stopping power. 4K, 60fps for smooth slow-mo option, punchy color grade with crushed blacks and saturated brand colors.

modular_components.subject: mystical eye with galaxy iris
modular_components.action: sudden opening, pupil dilation, shockwave emanation
modular_components.camera: snap zoom in, held, explosive push through to logo
modular_components.fx: card reflection in eye, golden geometry shockwave, logo from stardust
modular_components.technical: 4K 60fps, punchy grade, crushed blacks, saturated colors

variations: Replace eye with: crystal ball with swirling fate inside
Add: whispered 'discover your destiny' audio sync
Modify: three rapid cuts - eye, card, mandala, logo

mood_amplifiers.more_mystical: Add: ancient symbols glowing faintly, sense of hidden knowledge being unveiled
mood_amplifiers.more_serene: Add: slower movements, longer holds, meditation breathing rhythm, ASMR-quality attention to texture
mood_amplifiers.more_empowering: Add: rising energy, crescendo lighting, figure standing taller, triumphant subtle gestures
mood_amplifiers.more_intimate: Add: closer framing, softer focus, warmer color temperature, sense of private sacred moment
mood_amplifiers.more_cosmic: Add: deeper space vistas, more nebulae, galaxy rotations visible, sense of infinite scale

technical_variants.social_vertical: Reframe for 9:16 aspect ratio, tighter composition, text-safe zones top and bottom
technical_variants.tv_horizontal: Expand for 16:9 or 21:9 cinematic, more environmental context, premium feel
technical_variants.loop_friendly: Ensure first and last frames blend seamlessly, subtle cyclical motion
technical_variants.text_overlay_ready: Include negative space zones for copy, lower thirds clear, high contrast areas for legibility

platform_optimization.tiktok_reels: Front-load visual hook in first 0.5s, dynamic motion, trend-aware pacing
platform_optimization.youtube_preroll: Slower build acceptable, skip-button-proof opening, clear CTA moment
platform_optimization.instagram_story: Vertical native, tap-friendly pacing, swipe-up CTA visual cue
platform_optimization.website_hero: Seamless loop, no clear start/end, subtle ambient motion, fast load optimization

color_grading_instructions.primary_look: Deep cosmic foundation with mystical violet midtones and divine gold highlights

technical_specs.shadows: Push toward deep blue (#0B0B1A), never pure black
technical_specs.highlights: Warm gold peaks (#FFD700) with soft rolloff
technical_specs.saturation: Rich but not neon, organic mystical feel

color_grading_instructions.skin_tones: Preserve natural warmth, don't let blue/violet contaminate skin
color_grading_instructions.light_sources: Always have motivated light with soft falloff, volumetric when possible

audio_sync_notes.recommended_music_style: Ambient electronic with organic textures, ethereal vocals, subtle percussion
audio_sync_notes.bpm_range: 60-80 BPM for serene, 80-100 for empowering, 100-120 for hooks
key_sync_moments: Eye opening = musical swell or reveal sting
audio_sync_notes.suggested_artists: Ólafur Arnalds, Nils Frahm, Bonobo ambient works, Carbon Based Lifeforms

sora_specific: Be extremely detailed about physics and materials
Include lighting direction and quality details
veo_specific: Front-load the most important visual elements
Use clear action verbs for motion
Include style references the model knows
qwen_specific: Use both English and specific technical terms
Reference known cinematic styles and directors
Be explicit about what should NOT appear
general_best_practices: Specify what to avoid as much as what to include
Describe the emotional journey, not just visuals

always_avoid: text or watermarks in generated content
recognizable brand logos or copyrighted characters

quick_copy_prompts.instagram_story_hook: Mystical close-up of glowing tarot card slowly revealing on dark velvet surface, golden sacred geometry particles rising from the card, soft violet volumetric lighting, shallow depth of field, 9:16 vertical, 3 second seamless loop, ethereal luxury aesthetic, 4K.
quick_copy_prompts.tiktok_scroll_stopper: Dramatic eye with galaxy iris snapping open, cosmic shockwave emanating outward, deep blue to violet color grade, punchy contrast, 1 second, vertical 9:16, cinematic, attention-grabbing, 4K 60fps.
quick_copy_prompts.website_hero_loop: Serene cosmic sanctuary interior with floating mandala gently rotating, soft violet and indigo volumetric light rays, stardust particles drifting, ethereal and peaceful atmosphere, seamless 10 second loop, horizontal 16:9, 4K, ambient motion, no clear start/end point.
quick_copy_prompts.youtube_ad_opener: First-person glide through ornate celestial portal into cosmic meditation space, golden sacred geometry frame pulsing with light, reveal of personal sanctuary with floating platforms, smooth steadicam, 5 seconds, 16:9 cinematic, mystical wonder, 4K HDR.
